DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , control , double-blind , clinical trial carry . Adolescents age 15 18 year answer questionnaire Research Diagnostic Criteria Temporomandibular Disorders ( RDC/TMD ) specific clinical exam RDC/TMD also carry diagnosis temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) , prior intervention . They also submit electromyographic analysis masseter muscle anterior bundle temporal muscle bilaterally determination TMD . The type occlusion participant determine clinical examination base Angle classification occlusal contact point record use T-Scan III . Before intervention , mandibular range motion assess register maximum voluntary mouth opening , maximum passive mouth open excursion well record pain upon palpation masseter temporal muscle use visual analog scale . The volunteer diagnose TMD divide four group two session LLLT placebo treatment carry six week . One group receive low-level laser ( LLL ) treatment temporomandibular joint ( TMJ ) region , one receive LLL treatment masseter temporal muscle , one receive mixed application LLL ( muscle TMJ ) group receive placebo treatment . After last session LLL treatment electromyographic analysis , record occlusal contact point , mandibular range motion pain upon palpation carry . 30 day follow last session occlusal contact point , mandibular range motion pain upon palpation record . Individuals dentofacial anomaly , incomplete permanent dentition 2nd molar , currently undergo orthodontic orthopedic treatment jaw , currently undergo psychological treatment physical therapy making use muscle relaxant , anti-inflammatory agent bite plate exclude study . The data submit descriptive statistical analysis . The chi-square test Fisher 's exact test use determination association among categorical variable . The Student 's t-test analysis variance use comparison mean electromyographic signal . Pearson 's correlation coefficient calculate analysis correlation among continuous variable .
